title: Hello there Eune  is garbage now
body: 1. So for already a weak now the Eune servers dont work properly whenever i try to log  i wait 3 mins try to load prfile not gonna happen click play wait few secs chose mod press star game or whever form 5 min to 30 min just to load the lobby after thta cant invite friends press find match doesnt notify me when found when i click accept doesnt count at all wait 5 min or 15 or half an hour doesnt allow me to pick or ban champion in game i ahve 40 to 50 ms  game feels like with 50000 my pc is cpu i3 2100 gpu gtx1050ti 8 gb ram windows 7 (10 is shi.t) and its not only me every frind of mine haves the same issues or connection is normal like 40 or 50 mbs i dont get it fix your garbage servers location Bulgaria any idea how to fix or some kind of help maybe sorry about mistakes  my keyboard is scrap

replies.body: Eambo recently posted about[ EUNE connection issues ](https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements-en/9aupEmoP-23-06-17-issues-with-bulgaria-and-surrounding-regions)on the EU boards, and the culprit might be an ISP routing to a bad node.  If the issue is continuing for you, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech guys can take a deeper look and find some options for you.  We'll see you there!
Talk to your provider. It's an ISP issue.
